name: Cold cats (Andyruew)
description:
Cold Cats

Cold cats is a single player, platform, survival game. You play as a cold kitty named Fuligin .  Who got separated from his loving owner. Your objective is to make sure Fuligin gets food to keep his hunger bar full, while also going near objects that emit warmth to fill your warmth bar.

In order to find the necessary items for survival you will be required to traverse the city not only horizontally, but vertically as well.  Almost every building is climbable, especially for a cat!


TRI-AI STUDIOS

Abdallah Abou-Chahine

Andrew Schroer

Avery Richard

Isabelle Legault
